title: Marinara Sauce
directions: Pour tomatoes into a large bowl and crush with your hands. Pour 1 cup water into can and slosh it around to get tomato juices. Reserve.
In a large skillet (do not use a deep pot) over medium heat, heat the oil. When it is hot, add onion. Briefly cook then add garlic.
As soon as garlic is sizzling (do not let it brown), add the tomatoes, then the reserved tomato water. Add red pepper flakes, oregano, Italian seasoning and salt. Stir.
If using meatballs, add meatballs now. Simmer sauce and meatballs until thickened and oil on surface is a deep orange, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: 15-ounce can diced or crushed San Marzano tomatoes.
